venue.name: Dog Talk Training and Wellness Sanctuary LLC

item.description:
http://www.petwellnessfestival.org/

Join us for our 9th Annual Pet Wellness Festival
Saturday, September 29, 2012
New England Pet Partners Inc.
10:00 - 4:00 pm

Raising Awareness about Pet Wellness and Education
Different causes with common goals come together to form strong connections
Knowledge - Harmony - Whole Health - Well-Being

Enjoy many benefits like Massage, Reiki, Acupressure, TTouch, behavior and intuitive counseling. Meet authors, registered pet partners and Reading Education Assistance Dog teams. Explore how you can share your pet safely with others.

Explore a buffet of products and services (discover more about pwf's uniqueness and contributors/sponsors).

Registration: Individual/Family including 1 Pet - $10.00
Additional Pets are $5.00 each.

Donation proceeds will benefit New England Pet Partners Inc., a non-profit, 501(c)(3) dedicated to enhancing well-being and education with pet assisted therapy.

http://www.petwellnessfestival.org/

Â

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH
